channel.title: 🏢 Koç University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Koç University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Exploring the Precise Dynamics of Single-Layer GAN Models: Leveraging Multi-Feature Discriminators for High-Dimensional Subspace Learning
item.description: Single-layer GANs learn data subspaces more effectively using multi-feature discriminators, enabling faster training and better feature representation than conventional methods.
